entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening and ending before morning. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
